tileset = "cave_aqua";
area = "serpentcave2";
areaname = "Serpent\'s Lair";
ambience = null;
dungeon = "SerpentCave";
ambience = GenericExternalAmbience({ra:80,rb:0,ga:90,gb:0,ba:100,bb:0,aa:100,ab:0});
A_sprites = [{name:"Save Crystal",model:"o_Crystal",x:19,y:30,walkspeed:-1,conv:"c_healingCrystal"},{name:"UP",model:"area_transition",x:36,y:13,dest:["serpentcave1",11,32]}];
if(!GameData.plotVars.ch3SERPENT_DEFEATED)
{
   A_sprites.push({name:"TALKTRIGGER",model:"talktrigger",x:9,y:27,NPC:"Sea Serpent",dir:"s"});
   A_sprites.push({name:"Sea Serpent",model:"ch3bosses",x:9,y:26,walkspeed:-2,elem:"WATER",FRAME:1,conv:[["","A jolly good hello to you there, stranger who is invading my lair! I say, it\'s mighty rude of you to go and do that, old chap! I suppose you\'re here for my magnificent crest, eh? To sell it to poachers or use it in a brew?"],["","Alas, I suppose I\'m going to have to brutally slaughter and devour you, old sport, because I don\'t want to part with the old headpiece. Nothing personal, mind."],Do = function()
   {
      _root.specBtlBG = "cave_aqua_serpent";
      BATTLE([["Serpent",null,null,null],["Serpent",null,null,null],[30,null,null,null],"DRAGON","Serpent"],"BossBattle",true,true);
      GameData.plotVars.ch3SERPENT_DEFEATED = true;
      return 1;
   }]});
}
